name: BusinessPartySimulator
description:
This game is a prototype, the ideas for the game came from a random server on discord. I asked people what they wanted and made it into a game. The project is not yet done, and I am still working on it, updates will come.

Development:

https://www.twitch.tv/mathieu_auclair

Controls:

Use a gamepad for better controls.

  • CTRL => jump
  • Arrow keys => movements

Multiplayer:

The game is multiplayer so you can invite your friends to play with you.  You only need to open the port 7777 on your router configuration at home, then give your IP to your friend so they can join your game
